N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.10 - Special provision for the elderly and handicapped

State Regulations
(a) Where the utility knows, or reasonably
should know, that all the residents of a household are elderly, handicapped, or
18 years of age or younger, procedures as set forth in subdivision (a) of
section
459.9
of this Part shall be
followed throughout the entire year. (b) The utility annually may survey its
customers to determine the applicability of this provision to each residential
service address. The utility is not liable for the failure of any customer to
furnish such information. Notes
